playAudio

public void playAudio(String url,
                      boolean autoPlay,
                      boolean controls,
                      boolean loop,
                      boolean position,
                      String startStyle,
                      String stopStyle)
Play audio.

Parameters:
url - - audio url to be played
autoPlay - - if audio should play immediately
controls - - should native player controls be visible
loop - - should video start over again after finishing
position - - should audio be included with ad content
startStyle - - normal/full screen (if audio should play in native full screen mode)
stopStyle - - normal/exit (exit if player should exit after audio stops)

playVideo

public void playVideo(String url,
                      boolean audioMuted,
                      boolean autoPlay,
                      boolean controls,
                      boolean loop,
                      int[] position,
                      String startStyle,
                      String stopStyle)
Play video.

Parameters:
url - - video url to be played
audioMuted - - should audio be muted
autoPlay - - should video play immediately
controls - - should native player controls be visible
loop - - should video start over again after finishing
position - - top and left coordinates of video in pixels if video should play inline
startStyle - - normal/fullscreen (if video should play in native full screen mode)
stopStyle - - normal/exit (exit if player should exit after video stops)
